alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Grant; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:59AM CDT until March 31 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected to move in this afternoon and evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches with highest totals near the South Dakota border. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph with blowing and drifting snow. Near blizzard conditions possible in areas of highest snowfall. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing drizzle or light snow at times this morning. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon today to 4 AM CDT Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
